short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Re-Me reminds you to revisit a website after a set period of time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Re-Me is a handy extension that helps you remember and revisit the links you save on the web. 
Whether it's an article you want to read later, a video you want to watch again, or a website you want to explore more, Re-Me lets you save the link and set a timer for when you want to be reminded of it. 
You can choose from different intervals, such as daily, weekly, monthly, or custom. Re-Me will send you a notification when it's time to check out your saved link. 
You can also view and manage your saved links on the Re-Me web app. 
Re-Me is a simple and effective way to keep track of your online interests and never miss out on something you wanted to see. 

Install Re-Me today and start re-discovering the web!
